item.title: PINS
item.description: score:17 Chances: The company’s business has shown improvement as efforts to bolster its platform have been successful. Shares of social commerce platform Pinterest (NYSE: PINS) jumped 6% following a report on a potential advertising partnership with Google. Based on the average brokerage recommendation, Pinterest (PINS) should be added to one’s portfolio.
